ch.zhaw.psit.towerhopscotch.models.entities.enemies

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.psit.towerhopscotch.models.entities.Entity
      • ch.zhaw.psit.towerhopscotch.models.entities.enemies.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bat, Goblin, Imp, Rat, Skeleton, Slime, Spider

    public abstract class Enemy
extends Entity
    Represents an enemy which tries to attack the base from the player
    Author:
    Nicolas Eckhart

      • teleport

        public boolean teleport()
        Teleports the enemy onto a different layer if there is a tile on his current x and y coordinates on the target layer. Teleportation occurs randomly.
        Returns:
        boolean if teleported or not
